## Connect.getMetadata() method

Retrieves the metadata for the specified resource.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getMetadata(resourceName: string, useCache?: boolean): Promise<Metadata>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

resourceName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The name of the resource to retrieve the metadata for.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

useCache


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to use the cached metadata if available. Default: true.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Metadata](./foundation-comms.metadata.md)&gt;

A promise that resolves with the metadata.
